remarks: Lemma for ~ cnre2csqima (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Sep-2017.)
statement:
cnre2csqlem.1 $e |- ( G |` ( RR X. RR ) ) = ( H o. F ) $.
cnre2csqlem.2 $e |- F Fn ( RR X. RR ) $.
cnre2csqlem.3 $e |- G Fn _V $.
cnre2csqlem.4 $e |- ( x e. ( RR X. RR ) -> ( G ` x ) e. RR ) $.
cnre2csqlem.5 $e |- ( ( x e. ran F /\ y e. ran F ) -> ( H ` ( x - y ) ) = ( ( H ` x ) - ( H ` y ) ) ) $.
cnre2csqlem $p |- ( ( X e. ( RR X. RR ) /\ Y e. ( RR X. RR ) /\ D e. RR+ ) -> ( Y e. ( `' ( G |` ( RR X. RR ) ) " ( ( ( G ` X ) - D ) (,) ( ( G ` X ) + D ) ) ) -> ( abs ` ( H ` ( ( F ` Y ) - ( F ` X ) ) ) ) < D ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x $.
$d H x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
